result.name: mushroom_survey_england
result.notes:
Mushroom bed area and tonnage of compost used in mushroom production in England.

The Mushroom survey was last conducted in 2010 and was then discontinued. Data for the Mushroom survey 2010 can be found at the national archives site: https://webarchive.nationalarchives.gov.uk/20130123213232/http://www.defra.gov.uk/statistics/foodfarm/landuselivestock/mushrooms/ 

Source agency: Environment, Food and Rural Affairs
Designation: National Statistics
Language: English
Alternative title: Mushroom production

Contact details: farming-statistics@defra.gsi.gov.uk

organization.name: department-for-environment-food-and-rural-affairs
organization.title: Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs
organization.description:
We are the UK government department responsible for policy and regulations on environmental, food and rural issues. Our priorities are to grow the rural economy, improve the environment and safeguard animal and plant health.

Defra is a ministerial department, supported by 38 agencies and public bodies.

https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/department-for-environment-food-rural-affairs
